extension.name: k2fields contents
extension.author: $Author$
extension.description: K2/k2fields contents presentation based on various powerful slideshows with ability to partition along category and authors. Will include other options in near future.

field.name: part_by
field.label: PARTITION_BY
field.description:
Currently the following combinations are supported:
lof/lof
...

field.name: widgetkit_keepsynch
field.label: Keep synchronized module setting and widget

field.name: camera_height
field.label: height
field.description: here you can type pixels (for instance '300px'), a percentage (relative to the width of the slideshow, for instance '50%') or 'auto'

field.name: camera_time
field.label: time
field.description: milliseconds between the end of the sliding effect and the start of the nex one

field.name: camera_transPeriod
field.label: transPeriod
field.description: length of the sliding effect in milliseconds

field.name: camera_navigationHover
field.label: navigationHover
field.description: when to show the navigation button (prev, next and play/stop buttons)

field.name: camera_portrait
field.label: portrait
field.description: Select true if you don't want that your images are cropped

field.name: camera_slideOn
field.label: slideOn
field.description: decide if the transition effect will be applied to the current (prev) or the next slide

field.name: catid
field.label: Top most category or Stickyness criteria

field.name: excludecatids
field.label: Exclude the following categories (including subcategories of selected categories)

field.name: items
field.label: Drag and drop to re-order items

field.name: sticktofields
field.label: Select one or more fields to stick to (Applies only if sticky criteria is set to item/field)
field.query: SELECT f.id as value, concat(trim(substring(f.name, 1, instr(f.name, ' / '))), ' (', c.name, ')') as sticktofields FROM #__k2_extra_fields f INNER JOIN #__k2_extra_fields_groups g ON f.`group` = g.id INNER JOIN #__k2_categories c ON c.extraFieldsGroup = g.id WHERE f.published = 1 AND c.published = 1 ORDER BY c.`id`, f.`ordering`

field.name: getChildren
field.label: Fetch items from children categories
field.description: Immediate children selects immediate children of chosen top most category

field.name: timerange
field.label: Time range
field.description: All counts relative to today. Need to select field to set range on.

field.name: timerangefield
field.label: Select a date/datetime field that will be used for the time range filtering
field.query: SELECT s.id as value, CONCAT(SUBSTR(s.pname, 1, LOCATE('---', s.pname)-1), ' (', cname, ')') as timerangefield FROM (SELECT f.id, SUBSTR(f.name, LENGTH('k2f---')+1) as pname, c.name as cname FROM #__k2_extra_fields f INNER JOIN #__k2_extra_fields_groups g ON f.`group` = g.id INNER JOIN #__k2_categories c ON c.extraFieldsGroup = g.id INNER JOIN #__k2_extra_fields_definition d ON f.id = d.id WHERE f.published = 1 AND c.published = 1 AND d.definition LIKE '%valid=date%' ORDER BY c.`id`, f.`ordering`) AS s

field.name: popularityRange
field.label: Time range (if ordering is set to 'most popular' or 'most commented')

field.name: itemAuthorAvatarWidth
field.label: Custom width for user avatar (in px)

field.name: itemIntroTextWordLimit
field.label: Introtext word limit
field.description: Leave blank to diasble. If you enable this option, all html tags from the text will be cleaned up to make sure the html structure of the site does not brake.

field.name: imagefield
field.label: Select an image field that will replace K2 image
field.description: Please select appropriate one for each field group/category
field.query: SELECT s.id as value, CONCAT(SUBSTR(s.pname, 1, LOCATE('---', s.pname)-1), ' (', cname, ')') as imagefield FROM (SELECT f.id, SUBSTR(f.name, LENGTH('k2f---')+1) as pname, c.name as cname FROM #__k2_extra_fields f INNER JOIN #__k2_extra_fields_groups g ON f.`group` = g.id INNER JOIN #__k2_categories c ON c.extraFieldsGroup = g.id INNER JOIN #__k2_extra_fields_definition d ON f.id = d.id WHERE f.published = 1 AND c.published = 1 AND d.definition LIKE '%valid=media%' ORDER BY c.`id`, f.`ordering`) AS s

field.name: catReadMore
field.label: Category read more... link
field.description: If more items than what's provided by Item count then this link will appear

field.name: itemReadMore
field.label: Read more... link
field.description: This option is not applicable for an item in which the 'fulltext' block is empty.

field.name: itemPreText
field.label: Description text at the top for each of the tabs and a generic one (optional)

field.name: itemExtraFieldsCriterias
field.label: Selection criterias applied to each of the tabs
